name: BaguetteMan
description:
A game made in godot in one weekend for a youtube video. It's a simple arena shooter, where you die if you use all your bullets. You play as a man made up of baguettes killing cupcakes that are coming for you. If you use throw all the baguettes that make up your body, you die. If a cupcake touch you, you die.

The video: 

Controls :

wasd, and left mouse click.
